sqlMap.select:
SELECT SRVC_ID , SRVC_CD , SRVC_NM , UNIT , DSCRT , RESTAR_ID , IS_USED , TYPE , IS_DEFAULT , PRICE , DISCOUNT FROM srvc
RESTAR_ID = #RESTAR_ID#
SRVC_CD = #SRVC_CD#
USER_NAME = #USER_NAME#
SRVC_ID = #SRVC_ID#
TYPE = #TYPE#
IS_USED = #IS_USED#
IS_DEFAULT = 1

SELECT M.SRVC_ID , M.SRVC_CD , M.SRVC_NM , M.UNIT , M.DSCRT , M.RESTAR_ID , M.TYPE , M.IS_USED , M.USER_NAME , M.IS_DEFAULT , M.PRICE , M.DISCOUNT , M.CHANGE_DATE , M.ACCUMULT , M.AMOUNT_STORE , M.REASON , R.CD_NM as TYPE_NM FROM srvc M LEFT JOIN cmm_cd R ON R.CD = M.TYPE and R.GROUP_CD = 'DIHVU'
M.RESTAR_ID = #RESTAR_ID#
M.USER_NAME = #USER_NAME#
M.SRVC_ID = #SRVC_ID#
M.SRVC_CD = #SRVC_CD#
M.TYPE = #TYPE#
M.IS_USED = 1
M.IS_USED = 0
IS_DEFAULT = 1
sqlMap.sql:
SELECT M.SRVC_ID , M.SRVC_CD , M.SRVC_NM , M.UNIT , M.DSCRT , M.RESTAR_ID , M.TYPE , M.USER_NAME , R.CD_NM as UNIT_NM , M.IS_USED , M.IS_DEFAULT , M.PRICE , M.SORT_NO , M.DISCOUNT , M.CHANGE_DATE , M.ACCUMULT , M.AMOUNT_STORE FROM srvc M LEFT JOIN cmm_cd R ON R.CD = M.UNIT and R.GROUP_CD = 'DONVI'
M.RESTAR_ID = #RESTAR_ID#
M.IS_USED = 1
M.IS_USED = 0
ORDER BY M.SRVC_CD
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO srvc ( SRVC_ID , SRVC_CD , SRVC_NM , UNIT , DSCRT , RESTAR_ID , TYPE , USER_NAME , IS_USED , IS_DEFAULT , PRICE , SORT_NO , DISCOUNT , CHANGE_DATE , ACCUMULT , AMOUNT_STORE ) VALUES ( #SRVC_ID# , #SRVC_CD# , #SRVC_NM# , #UNIT# , #DSCRT# , #RESTAR_ID# , #TYPE# , #USER_NAME# , #IS_USED# , #IS_DEFAULT# , #PRICE# , #SORT_NO# , #DISCOUNT# , #CHANGE_DATE# , #ACCUMULT# , #AMOUNT_STORE# )

UPDATE srvc
SRVC_CD = #SRVC_CD#
SRVC_NM = #SRVC_NM#
UNIT = #UNIT#
DSCRT = #DSCRT#
TYPE = #TYPE#
RESTAR_ID = #RESTAR_ID#
USER_NAME = #USER_NAME#
IS_USED = #IS_USED#
IS_DEFAULT = #IS_DEFAULT#
SORT_NO = #SORT_NO#
PRICE = #PRICE#
DISCOUNT = #DISCOUNT#
CHANGE_DATE = #CHANGE_DATE#
ACCUMULT = #ACCUMULT#
WHERE SRVC_ID = #SRVC_ID#
sqlMap.select: SELECT count(t.SRVC_ID) as COUNT FROM () t

SELECT * FROM ( select h.* , @row := @row + 1 AS rn1 from () h ,(SELECT @row := 0) K ) t
WHERE rn1 > #MIN# and rn1 <= #MAX#
sqlMap.insert:
UPDATE srvc
AMOUNT_STORE = #AMOUNT_STORE#
CHANGE_DATE = #CHANGE_DATE#
USER_NAME = #USER_NAME#
,REASON = #REASON#
WHERE SRVC_ID = #SRVC_ID#

INSERT INTO srvc_history ( SRVC_ID , SRVC_CD , SRVC_NM , UNIT , DSCRT , RESTAR_ID , TYPE , USER_NAME , IS_USED , IS_DEFAULT , PRICE , SORT_NO , DISCOUNT , CHANGE_DATE , ACCUMULT , AMOUNT_STORE , HIS_ID , HIS_NOTE , HIS_CHANGE_TIME ) VALUES ( #SRVC_ID# , #SRVC_CD# , #SRVC_NM# , #UNIT# , #DSCRT# , #RESTAR_ID# , #TYPE# , #USER_NAME# , #IS_USED# , #IS_DEFAULT# , #PRICE# , #SORT_NO# , #DISCOUNT# , #CHANGE_DATE# , #ACCUMULT# , #AMOUNT_STORE# , #HIS_ID# , #HIS_NOTE# , #HIS_CHANGE_TIME# )
sqlMap.sql:
SELECT h.* , @row := @row + 1 AS rn1 FROM( select * from srvc_history S
S.SRVC_ID = #SRVC_ID#
S.RESTAR_ID = #RESTAR_ID#
S.HIS_CHANGE_TIME = #HIS_CHANGE_TIME#
order by S.his_change_time desc )h,(SELECT @row := 0) K
sqlMap.select:
select M.* from () M
WHERE M.rn1 > 0 and M.rn1 <= 31
sqlMap.insert:
UPDATE srvc_history
AMOUNT_STORE = #AMOUNT_STORE#
HIS_CHANGE_TIME = #HIS_CHANGE_TIME#
USER_NAME = #USER_NAME#
HIS_NOTE = #HIS_NOTE#
WHERE HIS_ID = #HIS_ID#
